      • getCategoryHomePagePath

        protected String getCategoryHomePagePath(String homePagePath)
        concatenates categoryBasePath, locale, and homePagePath. If can't resolve this path the locale portion is removed.
        Parameters:
        homePagePath -
        Returns:
        localized path
